description:
Polished smooth cobblestone lines the road leading both north and south. To
the east the smooth granite wall that surrounds the city reaches high into
the sky. Criss crossed with sparkling mineral veins. To the west is a small
building with the insignia of the Whitestone Keep militia painted in white
and red on the sturdy looking wooden door.

extradescriptions.insignia: A white circle with a red sword, hilt down, identifies the Whitestone Keep Militia

name: Southern East Wall Road
